songs.title: About “All Night Long”
songs.lyrics:
[Demi Lovato talking about "All Night Long"]
So, "All Night Long" is pretty much a party song, and I recorded it when I went to Miami, and I got to do a collaboration with Timbaland. When Missy Elliot heard the song, she actually asked if she could be on the track and I could not say no because she is a rap legend. So, I said "yes", and the track turned out to be awesome and a lot of people had liked so far, and I hope you guys continue to like it!
